entry.title: New release for Peppermint: 0.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • UI bug fixes
  • switched from "ticket" to "issue"
  • Start of themes, mixture of light & dark -> more to come
  • docker image optimisation -> 2.9gb to 1.4gb
  • various ui improvements across mobile and desktop
  • fixed build error
  • fixed redirect to ticket not found

entry.title: New release for Peppermint: 0.5.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: OIDC authentication support
  • fix: issue titles caching between pages
  • fix: createdby added to portal tickets
  • fix: onboarding now only shows on first load
  • fix: improvements to dark mode
  • fix: mobile ui now inline with desktop
  • chore: icons updated
  • fix: mobile actions on tickets
  • Add default login to docker page by @SydneyWafflez in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/376
  • Add instructions for installing and using Certbot by @SydneyWafflez in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/377
  • Remove deprecated 'portal_locale' in seed by @dmeijboom in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/379

New Contributors

  • @SydneyWafflez made their first contribution in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/375
  • @dmeijboom made their first contribution in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/379

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/compare/0.5.1...0.5.2

entry.title: New release for Peppermint: 0.5.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add DNS comment to docker-compose by @SK-Crow in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/386
  • chore: working pwa
  • feat: initial documents rework by @potts99
  • feat: issue priority filter
  • feat: basic smtp email template editor
  • fix: various misc ui fixes
  • fix: keyboard shortcuts overtaking browser shortcuts
  • fix: dark mode ui improvements
  • fix oidc fixes & improvements
  • fix: /submit wrongly behind session flag
  • fix: remove mantine & fix notifications
  • fix: email user/pass & sql error fix
  • chore: stmp oauth bug fixes
  • chore: doc improvements
  • chore: add small colour accent to public tickets
  • fix: email config now is now verified on creation
  • fix: changes to portal ticket creation

New Contributors

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/compare/0.5.2...0.5.3.1

entry.title: New release for Peppermint: 0.5.4
entry.content:

  • Site Update by @BobThePogBuilder in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/391

Core Updates

  • feat: oauth based imap mailbox support
  • feat: replyto email adds comment to ticket
  • feat: sidebar improvements
  • feat: disable keyboard shortcuts feature flag (first feature flag)
  • fix: issue title being cut off
  • fix: sender unkown on assigned email
  • fix: add reset smtp button for connection refused errors
  • chore: lots code clean up
  • chore: package updates

New Contributors

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/compare/0.5.3.1...0.5.3.2
